templates.template:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:d="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook">
<!-- This sample overrides the FO/PDF output. Be sure to import the one you really want --> <xsl:import href="../softlinks/docbook/fo/docbook.xsl"/>
<xsl:param name="shade.verbatim" select="1" /> <xsl:attribute-set name="monospace.verbatim.properties"> <xsl:attribute name="font-size">9pt</xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="wrap-option">wrap</xsl:attribute> </xsl:attribute-set> </xsl:stylesheet>
